text: The food is horrible. Someone there can't cook. I ordered the chicken alfredo pasta and it looked like the sauce had gone bad (similar to spoiled milk). The taste was very offensive. I have given this place the benefit of the doubt so many …More

text: Crossett PH  is so backed up with orders. Manager is short handed, one delivery driver only- 1 in back while manager has to handle phones & window also. Courteous enough to walk out and  let me know thin  crust was not thawed for all the …More

name: Lisa Gregorio
text: Quick and efficient service with an online order. I arrived earlier than expected and only had to wait a minute or two before receiving the carryout order. The only thing I didn't care for was the size some of the vegetables on the pizza as …More

text: Pizza was hot when I went and picked it up.

text: The service was great from the in store girl and the delivery driver and i ended up delivering to the same place when i worked at mazzios and she was also very sweet and good at her job but greg the in store manager is rude and he lies. He acts like he has somewhere better to be and doesn't even do a thorough interview.

name: Shade Tucker
text: I always opt for text tracker and for reasons as such. My delivery arrived 40-50 mins after I received a text saying that it was out for delivery. I called and asked about the order and I was told that the text tracker is inaccurate and …More

name: Brandon Tully
text: Good food great staff

name: Andrew Brigham
text: So I ordered 2 p-zones from the local Crossett Ar Pizza hut. It was cooked way to fast. Bread was scorched and I can't tell but I think it might have cheese on top.

name: Zac Tyler
text: Great food, awesome staff.

name: Shantel Barnhill
text: The guy that took my order listened to my complaints about my last pizza and had the lady making my pizza make a few adjustments. That was probably the best pizza I've ever had!! Yall have to try a pepperoni lovers on a hand tossed crust …More

name: Emilie Kippen
text: I ordered online at the crossett Pizza Hut. I waited an hour for my pizza finally called to ask if my pizza was coming. They proceeded to hang up on me so i called back. They said they cancelled my order bc their system shut down and said they called me to let me know, but i never received a phone call! Thanks Pizza Hut for nothing

name: Marissa Martinez
text: The buffet has a great selection of pizza and they keep it full throughout lunch time. The staff is amazing and so friendly. Definitely going to go back more often for the fantastic service and food!

name: Carol Jenkins
text: Went to Pizza Hut on Friday night all we got on our Supreme medium pizza was bell pepper.

name: Ricky C
text: Bathroom sink was filthy. Server never came to check on me, did not bring a plate or silverware or napkins, had to ask for all of that. Got my own refill, hope they don't wonder why I didn't leave a tip.

name: Leah Woods
text: I will NEVER order from this store again. It took an hour of waiting for me to finally call and check the status of my order, only to be told that the delivery guy was 'getting ready to head my way'.  He brought me a stone cold pizza with …More

name: Jen Myers
text: I always order on the way from LR to Hamburg. I order on the app and its always ready on time. 4 stars because they always seem to be out of spinach :(. Other than that they're pretty good!

name: Casey Tumlison
text: I love Pizza Hut pizza is the only reason why I ever try this location. I can always bet on the service to suck royally!! Either order is never on time or right.

name: Ray S
text: The best part about this place is Chris. He is the nicest guy you ever want to meet. He is the only reason I keep going to this pizza hut.

name: Janie Noller
text: I ate 1 piece was not any pizza on bsr that I liked. Asked for pepperoni it took 45 minutes. Did eat any left

name: Lydia Harris
text: I decided to sit in (horrible decision) the place was nasty there was trash on the floor & the seats. The service was so slow. I ordered one pizza & it took a hour! Poor customer service. The pizza was actually pretty good.

text: It took 50 minutes to get our pizzas and then there's no tomato sauce on it and 2 were burnt. This is ridiculous. And they gave attitude when we complained

name: Barry Mills
text: Located in the south part of town and away from most other businesses, it's out of the way; nice neighborhood but bad location. Food is usually good, but lacks professionalism and too many management changes. Most visits, table services is non-existent.

text: Very unfortunate that this business has declined so badly over the last couple decades. 1 person working during the lunch shift. Unless Pizza Hut Corporate steps up to save the business with a relaunch and new crew, it won't be in business much longer.

text: Just ordered a pizza and drink when it was delivered the guy didn't have my drink, crushed pepper, or parmesan cheese. Opened the box and it's the worst excuse of a pizza I've ever seen. Wasted $20!
